transcript.text: [Music]
hi guys Patrick back here welcome to in
pursuit of truth this is my new channel
it is not a music channel for those who
are here from my music channel please go
to youtube.com slash Sir Patrick travels
and again this is in pursuit of truth
now to those of you who have been
following me and have wondered what I
was talking about in my last video about
being band this is the channel where I'm
going to discuss some of these social
issues like that first of all I would
like to explain to you what's kind of
transpired over the last few days where
to start well I guess it started some
months back when my channel originally
got demonetised I mentioned that in my
video that created some problems over a
period of months back and forth dealing
with certain tick tack issues kind of
really and that eventually led them to
demagnetize in my channel now the other
day I downloaded the channel and excuse
me downloaded a video on an alternate
channel and it the views shot up really
really quickly as I was sort of checking
it and then it went straight down and it
was removed this led to a whole series
of events that I won't get into but it's
caused me to act and it's caused me to
create this channel a little bit about
in pursuit of truth this is not in
pursuit of my truth this is in pursuit
of truth itself the whole point is to
expose a few issues that I think is
concerning all of us citizens these days
I think we all know that the mainstream
media isn't giving us our news we think
we've known that for a long time I think
we know that they've been trying to kind
of push a narrative and I think a lot of
us are kind of tired of it now I'm by no
means a journalist I have no experience
in being injured I was a singer and an
actor I knew nothing about this kind of
stuff but over the years I've sort of
felt forced to have to go find my own
truth about a lot of things
and that's uncovered a lot of things
that I'd like to share with you I'd love
to be able to sit down here and just
share with you you know in one big long
story but I'm afraid it's not gonna work
that way I don't think would be safe to
do that I don't think it would be
advantageous to do that and
strategically I just don't think it
would be the right thing to do so so far
with this channel I have started a small
series called two minutes of truth and
it's just that it's a two minute short
video just explaining sort of the
surface level of the issues what we know
to be true and that encouraging you to
go look on your own there are some major
issues facing our nation right now that
I'd like to explore I'd sure like to
talk with others that would like to
explore these issues and I don't want
them to be partisan I don't want them to
be combative I just want to explore what
what's really going on I don't know how
to go about that I don't know the direct
path in kind of which to to set the
course for this channel but I do know
that I want to start expressing myself
in a way that I haven't been able to do
for a very very long time
so all that being said please join me
over here at in pursuit of truth you can
go to youtube and just search in pursuit
of truth you're gonna see this logo
right here you can click on it I'm gonna
try and give you lots of information in
the next coming weeks so please be
looking for those of you who got the PDF
please download that and save it offline
it's going to be important and it's
going to be relevant later to some of
the things that we're going to talk
about if you're not interested at all
just click away and keep moving on but
if you are come down the rabbit hole
with me my name is Sir Patrick Mac this
is in pursuit of truth
